com.kalixia.tapestry.perf4j.components.Graph

Component displaying a specified Perf4J graph. Most of the time you'll prefer to use the com.kalixia.tapestry.perf4j.components.Graphs component instead as it allow to dynamically update the graph displayed on the web page.

[JavaDoc]

Component Parameters

NameTypeFlagsDefaultDefault PrefixSinceDescription
nameStringNOT Allow NullpropName of the graph to generate.
